description: Current mortality rates in Europe are seeing a person die every 17 seconds, an official says.
title: Coronavirus: Europe faces 'six tough months' of pandemic, WHO says
title_page: Coronavirus: Europe faces 'six tough months' of pandemic, WHO says - BBC News
maintext: "Lockdowns are avoidable, I stand by my position that lockdowns are a last resort measure," Mr Kluge said. "Mask use is by no means a panacea, and needs to be done in combination with other measures. However, if mask use reached 95%, lockdowns would not be needed."
